sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './aside.css'; import { MenuStore } from '../../store/Menu'; const Aside = () => { const [dashActive, setDashActive] = useState(false); const [ecomActive, setEcomActive] = useState(false); const [pageActive, setPageActive] = useState(false); const [userActive, setUserActive] = useState(false); const [invoActive, setInvoActive] = useState(false); const [projActive, setProjActive] = useState(false); const [taskActive, setTaskActive] = useState(false); const [caleActive, setCaleActive] = useState(false); const [authActive, setauthActive] = useState(false); const handleMenu = () => { MenuStore.update(s => { s.menu =false }) } const menuState = MenuStore.useState(s => s) const dashClick = () => { setDashActive(!dashActive) setEcomActive(false) setPageActive(false) setUserActive(false) setInvoActive(false) setProjActive(false) setTaskActive(false) setCaleActive(false) setauthActive(false) } const pageClick = () => { setPageActive(!pageActive) setEcomActive(false) setDashActive(false) setUserActive(false) setInvoActive(false) setProjActive(false) setTaskActive(false) setCaleActive(false) setauthActive(false) } const ecomClick = () => { setEcomActive(!ecomActive) setPageActive(false) setDashActive(false) setUserActive(false) setInvoActive(false) setProjActive(false) setTaskActive(false) setCaleActive(false) setauthActive(false) } const userClick = () => { setDashActive(false) setEcomActive(false) setPageActive(false) setUserActive(!userActive) setInvoActive(false) setProjActive(false) setTaskActive(false) setCaleActive(false) setauthActive(false) } const invoClick = () => { setDashActive(false) setEcomActive(false) setPageActive(false) setUserActive(false) setInvoActive(!invoActive) setProjActive(false) setTaskActive(false) setCaleActive(false) setauthActive(false) } const projClick = () => { setDashActive(false) setEcomActive(false) setPageActive(false) setUserActive(false) setInvoActive(false) setProjActive(!projActive) setTaskActive(false) setCaleActive(false) setauthActive(false) } const taskClick = () => { setDashActive(false) setEcomActive(false) setPageActive(false) setUserActive(false) setInvoActive(false) setProjActive(false) setTaskActive(!taskActive) setCaleActive(false) setauthActive(false) } const caleClick = () => { setDashActive(false) setEcomActive(false) setPageActive(false) setUserActive(false) setInvoActive(false) setProjActive(false) setTaskActive(false) setCaleActive(!caleActive) setauthActive(false) } const authClick = () => { setDashActive(false) setEcomActive(false) setPageActive(false) setUserActive(false) setInvoActive(false) setProjActive(false) setTaskActive(false) setCaleActive(false) setauthActive(!authActive) } return (

Test 3

Get PRO Now
Jane Eyre

UX Designer

) }; export default Aside;
